title: Bug 108826AJDT Error: Can't find type
OB: In Eclipse 3.1, using the latest AspectJ build (1.5.0M3a compiler and 1.3.0plugin) I get an error "can't find type test.T" , using the following code:===============package test;public class CantFindType {public <T T[] method(T[] array) {return null;}}================The error occurs, if the return type, or the parameter is an array of a generictype.The code compiles fine, but Eclipse shows the error, but doesn't show the folderor the location for the error.
SR: In Eclipse 3.1, using the latest AspectJ build (1.5.0M3a compiler and 1.3.0plugin) I get an error "can't find type test.T" , using the following code:===============package test;public class CantFindType {public <T T[] method(T[] array) {return null;}}================The error occurs, if the return type, or the parameter is an array of a generictype.The code compiles fine, but Eclipse shows the error, but doesn't show the folderor the location for the error.
